entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
